channel.title: Geoengineering on Curiosity432 Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Geoengineering on Curiosity432 Blog

item.title: Chemtrails
item.description: A few months ago surfing the internet I was struck by an article of the Leonardo Di Caprio Foundation because the cover showed a sky full of chemtrails (which in the description of the photo they put as contrails xD). And to my surprise inside the article it was directly about the use of geoengineering. I criticized that article on twitter and a couple of months later they changed the web domain and removed it.
